name: Hotel Aaron

reviews.text: This small hotel is located in Mestre on the mainland, rather than on Venice island itself. Mainland hotels tend to have lower rates than equivalent hotels on the main island, and it's hardly an inconvenience: Venice island is just a short bus ride away on the frequent ACTV bus number 2 which stops close to the hotel. Travelcards for riding the ACTV waterbusses in Venice also cover bus travel on the mainland, including to and from Marco Polo Airport.
reviews.title: Small but perfectly formed

aka: Hotel Aaron Province Of Venice/Mestre, Italy
description: Hotel Aaron gives you modern accommodation, a friendly atmosphere, and a convenient location; 200 metres from Mestre Station. Reach Venice in 15 minutes by train or 10 minutes by bus!
